# useSubscription() function

React hook. Allows to subscribe to [VirtualScrollerEvent](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscrollerevent) without unnecessary rerenders.

**Signature:**

```typescript
useSubscription: (model: VirtualScroller, events: readonly VirtualScrollerEvent[] | VirtualScrollerEvent[], callBack: () => void) => void
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>

model


</td><td>

[VirtualScroller](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller)


</td><td>

[VirtualScroller](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller) instance


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

events


</td><td>

readonly [VirtualScrollerEvent](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscrollerevent)<!-- -->\[\] \| [VirtualScrollerEvent](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscrollerevent)<!-- -->\[\]


</td><td>

array of [VirtualScrollerEvent](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscrollerevent) to subscribe


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

callBack


</td><td>

() =&gt; void


</td><td>

callback to be called


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns**

void

## Remarks

For example can be used in load-on-demand.
